10 STARS!! We highly recommend this gorgeous lake house! Inn The Cove is beautiful, tastefully decorated, spacious, comfortable, sparkling clean and very well maintained. The photos are accurate, however they do not do the home justice. Andrew & Ali, prepare to be rock stars in the vacation rental world. My daughter loved the home's aesthetic and has already started redecorating her own home.
THE SPACE: The home is very relaxing and offers a lot of indoor and outdoor space. The living room is large with plenty of comfortable and cozy seating. The kitchen is beautiful, well-stocked with lots of amenities and high quality appliances. The bedrooms are large with good storage, comfortable beds, plush linens and there were plenty of extra blankets/pillows provided by the host. The bathrooms are big with good water pressure and lasting hot water. Plenty of bathroom linens are provided. The outdoor deck is large with lots of seating, peaceful, quiet and perfect for morning coffee. The screened-in porch was by far my favorite spot. We had dinner there every night and then made s'mores at the fire pit. The washer and dryer worked well, the TV/Cable/WiFi all worked fine and the AC kept the home very comfortable. The dock is large and offers the use of kayaks and a pedal boat. The driveway/parking area is well lit and provides enough space for larger vehicles.
THE LOCATION: The home is nestled in a quiet cul-de-sac. It is very peaceful and private. The property is full of nature, we enjoyed seeing all the litter critters and we especially enjoyed the chipmunk greeter. The views of the lake are just gorgeous. We had no issues with privacy or noise from the neighbors. It was a 10 minute drive to the major chain stores.
THE HOST: Andrew responded quickly to my questions and offered us some awesome recommendations for fun things to do. We took them all and had a wonderful family vacation. We truly enjoyed our time at Inn The Cove. We plan to make this home our future Georgia vacation rental and can not wait to return. Andrew and Ali, we wish you the best of luck in the future and we thank you for the hospitality. ~ The Price 5
